all.description: Your foes' grenades and abilities apply the weaken effect, which reduces speed and increases damage taken. When Guardians apply the suppression effect, it lasts 50% longer.

displayProperties.name: Raider Shield

displayProperties.description: Enemies throw grenades significantly more often.

displayProperties.description:
You will face [Disruption] Overload and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

You must equip Anti-Overload and Anti-Unstoppable mods to your arms armor to defeat them. These mods come from the Seasonal Artifact.
displayProperties.name: Champion Foes

displayProperties.description: You will face [Disruption] Overload and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.
displayProperties.name: Champion Foes

displayProperties.description: Extra Shields
displayProperties.name: Hero Modifiers

displayProperties.description: You deal more damage with melee weapon attacks, but take more damage from foes that are far away.
displayProperties.name: Poleharm

displayProperties.description: Certain foes are stealthy when at a distance. They become visible when near a Guardian.
displayProperties.name: Subtle Foes

displayProperties.description: Your foes' grenades and abilities apply the weaken effect, which reduces speed and increases damage taken. When Guardians apply the suppression effect, it lasts 50% longer.
displayProperties.name: Weight of Weakness

displayProperties.description: All Vanguard Rank points earned are doubled.

displayProperties.description: All Nightfall loot drops are doubled.

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This weapon has active Deepsight Resonance that can be progressed.
This weapon has Resonant Elements available to be extracted. Open the details screen of the weapon to extract.

rewards.flavorText: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir
rewards.displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

grandmasterRewards.flavorText: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir
grandmasterRewards.displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.
